item.title: Android Home launcher from scratch
item.description: Intro # An attempt to create a simple android home screen launcher in kotlin. About # Features # Grid apps List apps Abilty to search for apps Gestures Support (Swipe Left to clear text, Swipe down to disable keyboard) App Size (small, medium, large) Always keyboard to search quickly Long press an app to uninstall the app or view system app settings Add blur to background (WIP) Built using # RecyclerView MVVM architecture Kotlin Android Studio Android ViewModel PackageManager Android Navigation Android Jetpack Screenshots # Grid View # List View # Settings #
